tool_description: Analyzes total project costs including appliance prices, installation, delivery, taxes, and optional extended warranties with financing options.

appliance_prices.description: Array of appliance prices in USD

installation_costs.description: Installation cost for each appliance in USD

delivery_costs.description: Delivery cost for each appliance in USD

tax_rate.description: Local sales tax rate as decimal (e.g., 0.08 for 8%)

extended_warranty.description: Whether to include extended warranty costs

financing_needed.description: Whether financing options should be calculated

interest_rate.description: Annual interest rate as decimal (e.g., 0.05 for 5%)

error_messages: Array length mismatch: appliance_prices, installation_costs, and delivery_costs must have same length
Invalid tax rate: Tax rate must be between 0 and 0.20 (20%)
Budget exceeded: Total costs exceed available budget
Invalid financing terms: Financing term must be 6-72 months, interest rate must be 0-0.30
Invalid discount code: One or more discount codes are expired or invalid
usage: Input all cost components and budget constraints to get complete financial analysis with optional financing calculations.

grand_total.description: Final total cost after all adjustments

monthly_payment.description: Monthly payment if financing is used
